name: Santa Dress Up Game
description:
Christmas is coming! Santa is about to set off, but he needs YOUR help. Make a new Santa Claus costume in this fun Christmas dress up game and help Santa get ready for his trip around the world!

Spend the up-coming holidays in high spirits playing Xmas games. Download ! Santa Dress Up - Christmas Party Games for Kids, choose your fave Santa Claus costume and show off your masterpiece!

COOL COSTUMES

Red suit looks good on Santa, but it's kind of old-school. Choose from variety of outfits to make your Santa look cool or fashionable. Have you seen Santa in yellow or green? Check it out!

EASY TO PLAY

All you need to do it press the buttons to change different parts of Santa's outfit. But, if you don't like the buttons, go ahead and touch Santa's legs or arms or head to find the best costume!

GREAT PASTIME

The little ones will enjoy the game as it is simple and fun so they can play for as long as they wish. Once they are done matching, they can take a picture with their Santa and show off.

Christmas bells are about to start ringing so hurry up and get your Christmas dress up games ready. With a variety of Santa outfits the game has to offer, it belongs to cool dress up games for girls and teens, but anyone really can have fun making their new best Santa outfit. Xmas games have always been fun to play, but this game takes fun Christmas games for kids to a whole different level. Check it out and download asap!

HOW TO PLAY ! Santa Dress Up - Christmas Party Games for Kids:

▶ touch Santa Claus or corresponding buttons to try on different Santa outfits
▶ make a new Santa Claus costume by combining different coats, pants, hats, glasses, shoes and types of beard
▶ dress up Santa Claus to look fashionable, casual or elegant
▶ touch the screen to choose different backgrounds
▶ press shuffle button to get random combinations of Santa outfits and backgrounds
▶ once you're done playing dressing up games, take a picture with Santa in your favorite Santa Claus costume and show it to all your friends


Christmas dress up games bring joy and happiness to the little ones like no other game would. Given that this game belongs to dress up games for kids, it sure will put a smile on your little one's face. Dress up Santa Claus in your favorite Santa outfit and let him proudly join gingerbread man, reindeer and little elves in other fun Christmas games. Download ! Santa Dress Up - Christmas Party Games for Kids and make your own Christmas story!
